Returns: The Rect region of the epicenter of transition or null if there is no epicenter.
Parameters: Transition: The transition for which the epicenter applies.
onGetEpicenter(android.transition.Transi.Description: Implementers must override to return the epicenter of the Transition in screen coordinates. Transitions like @B_android#transition#Explode_E@ depend upon an epicenter for the Transition. In Explode, Views move toward or away from the center of the epicenter Rect along the vector between the epicenter and the center of the View appearing and disappearing. Some Transitions, such as @B_android#transition#Fade_E@ pay no attention to the epicenter.

ClassDesc: Class to get the epicenter of Transition. Use @B_android#transition#Transition#setEpicenterCallback_E@ to set the callback used to calculate the epicenter of the Transition. Override @B_android#transition#Transition#getEpicenter_E@ to return the rectangular region in screen coordinates of the epicenter of the transition.
